00298     inline LoggerRepository *LogManager::loggerRepository()
00299     {   // QMutexLocker locker(&instance()->mObjectGuard); // Constant for object lifetime
00300         return instance()->mpLoggerRepository;  }
00301     
00302     inline bool LogManager::handleQtMessages()
00303     {   // QMutexLocker locker(&instance()->mObjectGuard);  // Read/Write of bool is safe
00304         return instance()->mHandleQtMessages;   }
00305     
00306     inline Logger *LogManager::logLogger()
00307     {   // QMutexLocker locker(&instance()->mObjectGuard); // Constant for object lifetime
00308         return logger(QLatin1String("Log4Qt"));   }
00309     
00310     inline Logger *LogManager::qtLogger()
00311     {   // QMutexLocker locker(&instance()->mObjectGuard); // Constant for object lifetime
00312         return logger(QLatin1String("Qt"));    }
00313     
00314     inline void LogManager::setHandleQtMessages(bool handleQtMessages)
00315     {   instance()->doSetHandleQtMessages(handleQtMessages);    }
00316
